member.name: AXISINFOA
member.summary: The AXISINFO structure contains information about an axis of a multiple master font.

member.name: AXISINFOA.axMinValue
member.summary: The minimum value for this axis.

member.name: AXISINFOA.axMaxValue
member.summary: The maximum value for this axis.

member.name: AXISINFOA.axAxisName
member.summary: The name of the axis, specified as an array of characters.
